title: For those of you who say "mid or feed"...
body:
Just so you know, if you say that when I'm above you in the pick order, I'll pick mid. Why? Because fuck you.

I don't even LIKE mid. I'm not even that GOOD at mid. But I'll do it anyway. Because fuck you. Besides, everyone knows "mid or feed" means "mid AND feed" anyway.

replies.body: I'd honestly rather have someone get their lane and not feed intentionally than not get their lane and troll.

> OP is like bronze.

**OP IS bronze**

FTFY

I don't even LIKE mid. I'm not even that GOOD at mid. But I'll do it anyway,
so when they say mid or feed you reply with no I wanna mid or feed waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Well I'm better than them anyway. I don't feed.

See, I'm not BAD at any role except ADC. I'm just best at jungle and support, with top as runner up.

> [{quoted}](name=Arcane Azmadi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fV7o5zf3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-10T14:01:45.088+0000)
>
> **Well I'm better than them anyway.**

lel humble

>2015
>thinking standard pregame sh*ttalk is real
